content: Collab.Land is an automated community management tool that allows creators and admins to easily configure rules for token-granted access to exclusive chats and content. The tool verifies that members possess required token(s) from their choice of 22 wallets and an additional 19 wallets available via WalletConnect. It also allows for integration with Discord and Telegram bots, and supports token-granted access on 23 different L1 and L2s using fungible tokens and NFTs. The company also claims that it does not share verified wallet addresses with anyone without explicit consent, and that it has a dedicated support team. Additionally, they are planning to launch a marketplace for developers who have apps that serve tokenized communities.
